txt.en: 'Oh, there was one other thing - one of my men spotted a dwarf heading into a cave north-east of here.\n\n'We think that may be where the Orcs around here have been coming from, but we haven't been able to spare any men to check it out. You may want to take a look around....'

Captain FÃ©arn mentioned that one of his men spotted a dwarf poking around the entrance to a cave north-east of Dol Baran. From the description it sounds like it might have been Ondor.\n\nKnowing how excitable Ondor can be, there's a fair chance he's gotten himself in some sort of trouble up there, and it might be a good idea to scout out the entrance to that cave.
You spot something lying next to the cave entrance...
You should see if you can discover any sign of Ondor the Dwarf near the entrance to the Pit of Iron in the north-east Heathfells.
